verses.roman:
evaṁ vyavasito buddhyā
satrājit sva-sutāṁ śubhām
maṇiṁ ca svayam udyamya
kṛṣṇāyopajahāra ha

synonyms: evam—thus; vyavasitaḥ—fixing his determination; satrājit—King Satrājit; sva—his own; sutām—daughter; śubhām—fair; maṇim—the jewel; ca—and; svayam—himself; udyamya—endeavoring; kṛṣṇāya—to Lord Kṛṣṇa; upajahāra ha—presented.
translation: Having thus intelligently made up his mind, King Satrājit personally arranged to present Lord Kṛṣṇa with his fair daughter and the Syamantaka jewel.
